channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- SonicOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- SonicOS

item.title: CVE-2021-20031|2024-08-03T17:30:07.419Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A Host Header Redirection vulnerability in SonicOS potentially allows a remote attacker to redirect firewall management users to arbitrary web domains.

item.title: CVE-2022-22277|2024-08-03T03:07:50.394Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A vulnerability in SonicOS SNMP service resulting exposure of Wireless Access Point sensitive information in cleartext.

item.title: CVE-2021-20019|2024-08-03T17:30:07.323Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A vulnerability in SonicOS where the HTTP server response leaks partial memory by sending a crafted HTTP request, this can potentially lead to an internal sensitive data disclosure vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-22275|2024-08-03T03:07:50.213Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Improper Restriction of TCP Communication Channel in HTTP/S inbound traffic from WAN to DMZ bypassing security policy until TCP handshake potentially resulting in Denial of Service (DoS) attack if a target host is vulnerable.

item.title: CVE-2021-20046|2024-08-03T17:30:07.777Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A Stack-based buffer overflow in the SonicOS HTTP Content-Length response header allows a remote authenticated attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) and potentially results in code execution in the firewall. This vulnerability affected SonicOS Gen 5, Gen 6 and Gen 7 firmware versions.

item.title: CVE-2022-22278|2024-08-03T03:07:50.277Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A vulnerability in SonicOS CFS (Content filtering service) returns a large 403 forbidden HTTP response message to the source address when users try to access prohibited resource this allows an attacker to cause HTTP Denial of Service (DoS) attack

item.title: CVE-2022-22274|2024-08-03T03:07:50.278Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS via HTTP request allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) or potentially results in code execution in the firewall.

item.title: CVE-2022-22276|2024-08-03T03:07:50.191Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A vulnerability in SonicOS SNMP service resulting exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized user.

item.title: CVE-2021-20027|2024-08-03T17:30:07.579Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in SonicOS allows a remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) by sending a specially crafted request. This vulnerability affects SonicOS Gen5, Gen6, Gen7 platforms, and SonicOSv virtual firewalls.

item.title: CVE-2021-20048|2024-08-03T17:30:06.959Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A Stack-based buffer overflow in the SonicOS SessionID HTTP response header allows a remote authenticated attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) and potentially results in code execution in the firewall. This vulnerability affected SonicOS Gen 5, Gen 6 and Gen 7 firmware versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29012|2024-08-02T01:03:51.511Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS HTTP server allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via sscanf function.

item.title: CVE-2024-29013|2024-08-02T01:03:51.681Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS SSL-VPN allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via memcpy function.

item.title: CVE-2024-40764|2024-07-18T13:37:13.495Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS IPSec VPN allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS).

item.title: CVE-2024-29013|2024-07-01T18:38:28.985Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS SSL-VPN allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via memcpy function.

item.title: CVE-2024-29012|2024-07-01T18:39:02.051Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS HTTP server allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via sscanf function.

item.title: CVE-2024-29013|2024-06-20T08:14:23.845Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS SSL-VPN allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via memcpy function.

item.title: CVE-2024-29012|2024-06-20T08:11:10.318Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS HTTP server allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via sscanf function.

item.title: CVE-2024-22396|2024-03-14T03:15:55.008Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: An Integer-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS via IPSec allows a remote attacker in specific conditions to cause Denial of Service (DoS) and potentially execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted IKEv2 payload.

item.title: CVE-2024-22397|2024-06-04T17:52:40.010Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in the SonicOS SSLVPN portal allows a remote authenticated attacker as a firewall 'admin' user to store and execute arbitrary JavaScript code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22394|2024-02-08T01:14:33.634Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description:
An improper authentication vulnerability has been identified in SonicWall SonicOS SSL-VPN feature, which in specific conditions could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication.
This issue affects only firmware version SonicOS 7.1.1-7040.

item.title: CVE-2024-22396|2024-06-21T19:20:49.979Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: An Integer-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS via IPSec allows a remote attacker in specific conditions to cause Denial of Service (DoS) and potentially execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted IKEv2 payload.

item.title: CVE-2024-40764|2024-07-18T07:42:37.995Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS IPSec VPN allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS).

item.title: CVE-2024-22397|2024-08-01T22:43:34.948Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in the SonicOS SSLVPN portal allows a remote authenticated attacker as a firewall 'admin' user to store and execute arbitrary JavaScript code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22396|2024-08-01T22:43:34.943Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: An Integer-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS via IPSec allows a remote attacker in specific conditions to cause Denial of Service (DoS) and potentially execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted IKEv2 payload.

item.title: CVE-2024-22394|2024-08-01T22:43:34.842Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description:
An improper authentication vulnerability has been identified in SonicWall SonicOS SSL-VPN feature, which in specific conditions could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication.
This issue affects only firmware version SonicOS 7.1.1-7040.

item.title: CVE-2024-40764|2024-08-02T04:39:54.567Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS IPSec VPN allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS).
